clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of Serum Zinc Levels Response to Treatment of Covid 19 Positive Patients
clinical_study.official_title: Zinc Levels in Covid-19 Positive Patients

lead_sponsor.agency: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

clinical_study.source: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluation of serum zinc levels response to treatment of covid 19 positive patients

detailed_description.textblock:
Since covid 19 and zinc act on the same receptor in the body, the effect of serum levels of
      patients on the course of the disease and response to treatment is examined.

primary_outcome.measure: The effect of serum zinc levels of patients on the course of the disease and response to treatment is examined.
primary_outcome.description: serum zinc levels (mcg/dL) will be measured in peripheral blood.

intervention.description: Since covid 19 and zinc act on the same receptor in the body, the effect of serum levels of patients on the course of the disease and response to treatment is examined.

biospec_descr.textblock: serum zinc level will be measured in peripheral blood.

study_pop.textblock:
Serum zinc levels of women between 18 and 45 years old who are covid positive and
        hospitalized in our hospital will be examined.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  covid positive women

          -  not use zinc pills

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  covid negative women

          -  have zinc metabolism disease

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Kanuni Sultan Suleyman Training and Research Hospital
